Title: Relates to requiring annual reports of legal settlement payments related to law enforcement activity
Summary: Requires annual reports of legal settlement payments related to law enforcement activity; provides such report shall include, but not be limited to, monetary amounts, plaintiffs and named parties, and shall be published on the website of the comptroller.
LawCode: Add ยง837-x, Exec L; add ยง14-192, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring annual reports of legal settlement payments related to law enforcement activity
